clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text:
We may revise these Terms of Use or any of the other Terms from time to time.
You are ,expected to check this page and our Terms from time to time to take notice of any changes

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: f any part of our business or operations is sold or transferred to, or integrated ,with, another organisation (or if we enter into negotiations for those purposes), ,your personal data may be disclosed to that organisation.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection (England, Wales)
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.
clauses.clause_text: These Terms of Use, our other Terms and any dispute or claim arising out of or in connection ,with them or their subject matter or formation (including non-contractual disputes or claims) ,shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the law of England and Wales.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: "We may process data about your use of our website and services ("usage data"), which we obtain through our analytics tracking systems. The usage data may include your IP address, geographical location, browser type and version, operating system, referral source"

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text:
We may disclose your personal data to our suppliers or contractors in connection ,with the uses described above.
For example, we may disclose:,a)any personal data in our possession to suppliers which host the servers on ,which our data is stored;

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Your provided identifiable information is actively checked by the service
clauses.description: The service checks if the required identifiable information you've provided is correct, and may do so on a regular basis. The check measures could be analyzing your browser information and/or providing the identifiable information to a third-party or the authority, thus compromising your anonymity.
clauses.clause_text:
Shortly after your account has been opened, we will conduct several ID checks.
,We will verify your email address and telephone number by sending you ,verification messages.
We will also verify your ID, which will require you to ,provide us with a copy of your photo ID, like your passport or driver’s licence, ,together with a selfie to compare to that document.
Depending on the ,verification tool we use, we might ask for proof of address.
Your selfie photo, ,photo ID, proof of address and the information associated with or visible on them ,(such as your name, date of birth, phone number, email address and physical ,address) are all together your “ID Data”.
We will use the ID Data to verify your ,identity for fraud prevention purposes.

case.text: Your provided identifiable information is actively checked by the service

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text: Some of the third parties to whom we may transfer your personal data, ,discussed above, may be located outside the EEA or may transfer your personal ,data to their own service providers located outside the EEA.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed
clauses.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed. This case doesn't apply to Services for which transparency regarding users identities is relevant for their purposes.
clauses.clause_text: At sign up, users are required to provide their full name.

case.text: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text: The account ,data may be processed for the purposes of operating our website, providing our ,services, ensuring the security of our website and services, and communicating ,with you.

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner
clauses.description: The service may employ a broad copyright license over feedback, proposals, ideas and suggestions submitted, including the right to use them without restriction, compensation or obligation to the user, but they do not claim ownership on them.
clauses.clause_text: If you provide any feedback to us in relation to our platform or any other service we offer ,through the Website, we will be free to act on any suggestions you provide and will not be ,obliged to notify you that your feedback was used, get your permission to use it, or pay you.

case.text: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner

clauses.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text: We will retain your personal data as follows:,a)most data associated with any account on our website (including account data, ,profile data, and correspondence data) will be kept during the life of the account ,and then deleted no more than twelve (12) months after account closure.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online
clauses.clause_text: We do not pre-moderate or have any ,control over what you include in forum data, so we ask that you carefully consider ,your own privacy in deciding what to post, especially since forum posts are public ,and visible to anyone browsing the forum.

case.text: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: a)the kinds of personal data that we may collect, use, store and transfer

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text: How we use your personal data,

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text: The legal basis means one of the permitted ,bases for processing set out in Article 6 of the General Data Protection ,Regulation (GDPR).

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: If you have indicated your interest in our services then we may ,also process correspondence data to provide you with occasional news about ,our services and marketing communications (although you will be free to ,unsubscribe at any time)

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: we expressly exclude any liability for any indirect or consequential loss or damage ,incurred by you in connection with the Website or in connection with the use, inability to ,use, or results of the use of the Website, however caused;

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: Access to the Website is provided “as is” and your use of the Website is at your own risk.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: You shall not use the Website (or assist ,anyone else to use the Website):,•in any way that breaches any applicable local, national or international law or ,regulation

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: We process profile ,data for the purposes of demographic screening.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text: If ,you register an account with us you will be responsible for keeping your account secure, and ,for all action taken using your account.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
clauses.description: The service asks the user to notify them immediately of any unauthorized use or security breaches.
clauses.clause_text: You shall notify us immediately if you suspect your ,account has been compromised.

case.text: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security

clauses.clause_text:
We may process data about your use of our website and services ("usage ,data"), which we obtain through our analytics tracking systems.
The usage data ,may include your IP address
